<title

>
[Dart](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=6)
</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 284 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

The target takes 1d6 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29). You gain an item bonus to this bleed damage equal to the weapon's item bonus to attack rolls.
name: Dart

The target takes 1d6  persistent bleed damage . You gain an item bonus to this bleed damage equal to the weapon's item bonus to attack rolls.
